text.div:
Peritoneum

A code that indicates the tumour invovlement in the peritoneum

This value set has an inline code system http://hl7.org/fhir/peritoneum, which defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinition
tumour_invades_peritoneal_surface Tumour invades to the peritoneal surface
tumour_formed_nodule Tumour has formed nodule(s) discrete from the tumour mass along the serosal surface

name: Peritoneum
description: A code that indicates the tumour invovlement in the peritoneum

concept.display: Tumour invades to the peritoneal surface
Tumour has formed nodule(s) discrete from the tumour mass along the serosal surface
